1.1.6 Paṭippassambhetabbaaṭṭhārasaka
Kammakkhandhaka
Tajjanīyakamma
Paṭippassambhetabbaaṭṭhārasaka
9.
50Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṃ deti, na sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
51Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ; kammaṃ na garahati, kammike na garahati—  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
52Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṃ karoti, na anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṃ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—  imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
53Paṭippassambhetabbaaṭṭhārasakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
10.
54Evañca pana, bhikkhave, paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. Tehi, bhikkhave, paṇḍukalohitakehi bhikkhūhi saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—  ‘mayaṃ, bhante, saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattāma, lomaṃ pātema, netthāraṃ vattāma, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācāmā’ti. Dutiyampi yācitabbā. Tatiyampi yācitabbā. Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo— 
55‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṃgho. Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṃ pātenti, netthāraṃ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācanti. Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheyya. Esā ñatti.
56Suṇātu me, bhante, saṃgho. Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṃ pātenti, netthāraṃ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācanti. Saṃgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheti. Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
57Dutiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi—  suṇātu me, bhante, saṃgho. Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṃ pātenti, netthāraṃ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācanti. Saṃgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheti. Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
58Tatiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi—  suṇātu me, bhante, saṃgho. Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṃ pātenti, netthāraṃ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācanti. Saṃgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheti. Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
59Paṭippassaddhaṃ saṃghena paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ. Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
60Tajjanīyakammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ paṭhamaṃ.
